pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a console emulator control that embeds a fully functional console view in a Windows Forms window. It is capable of running any console application with full interactivity and advanced console functions. Applications will detect it as an actual console and will not fall back to the output redirection mode with reduced interactivity or formatting.
